strings.ES_CROCO_PRIMARY_POISONBREATH_DESCRIPTIO: <style=cIsHealing>Poisonous.</style> Spray a caustic mist in front of you, dealing <style=cIsDamage>50% damage</style> per second, <style=cIsDamage>doubled</style> against <style=cIsHealing>poisoned</style> or <style=cIsDamage>blighted</style> enemies.
strings.ES_CROCO_SPECIAL_PURGE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict damage on all <style=cIsHealing>poisoned</style> or <style=cIsDamage>blighted</style> enemies in range, dealing either <style=cIsHealing>200% + 10% of their max health</style> or <style=cIsDamage>300% per stack</style> in an area around them, depending on <style=cIsUtility>passive selection</style>.
strings.ES_MAGE_UTILITY_ZAPPORT_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning. Overloading.</style> Charge to <style=cIsUtility>teleport</style> forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>250%-1000% damage</style> to enemies near target location.
strings.ES_BANDIT2_UTILITY_INVISSPRINT_DESCRIPTI: Passively become <style=cIsUtility>invisible while sprinting</style>.  Gain a burst of <style=cIsUtility>movement speed and increased damage</style> upon leaving <style=cIsUtility>invisibility</style>.
strings.ES_BANDIT2_PRIMARY_MAGICBULLET_DESCRIPTI: Fire a bullet that deals <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>, and <style=cIsUtility>ricochets</style> to a nearby enemy for <style=cIsDamage>60% of the previous hit's damage</style>.
strings.ES_CAPTAIN_PRIMARY_AUTOSHOTGUN_DESCRIPTI: Fire a blast of pellets that deal <style=cIsDamage>8x100% damage</style>.  <style=cIsUtility>Fire rate</style> increases while held.
strings.ES_CAPTAIN_SECONDARY_DEBUFFNADE_DESCRIPT: Launch a grenade that deals <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style> and inflicts <style=cArtifact>tracking</style> on enemies in a wide area for <style=cIsDamage>5 seconds</style>.
strings.ES_COMMANDO_PRIMARY_COMBATSHOTGUN_DESCRI: Fire flechette rounds, dealing <style=cIsDamage>6x60% damage</style> in a wider but shorter range.  <style=cIsUtility>Spread</style> decreases on <style=cIsDamage>critical strikes</style>.
strings.ES_COMMANDO_UTILITY_DASH_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsUtility>Prepare: Secondary. Agile. Dash</style> a short distance and become <style=cIsDamage>invulnerable</style> during and for a short period afterwards.
strings.ES_ENGI_PRIMARY_MICROMISSILES_DESCRIPTIO: Fire a projectile that deals <style=cIsDamage>20% damage</style> on impact and <style=cIsDamage>4 micromissiles trailing it for 15% damage each</style>.  Nearby <style=cIsUtility>turrets</style> also release <style=cIsDamage>2 micromissiles each</style>.
strings.ES_ENGI_SECONDARY_TESLAMINE_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning.</style> Place a shock mine, that upon detonation deals <style=cIsDamage>125% damage</style> and leaves a lingering zone for 5 <style=cIsDamage>seconds</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>125% damage each second</style>.  Can place up to <style=cIsDamage>4</style>.
strings.ES_HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_CLUSTERARROW_DESCR: <style=cIsUtility>Agile.</style> Fire an arrow that <style=cIsDamage>explodes</style> on impact, dealing <style=cIsDamage>500% damage</style> and releasing <style=cIsDamage>8 bomblets</style> that deal <style=cIsDamage>80% damage each</style>.  Critical strikes instead release <style=cIsDamage>12</style>.
strings.ES_LOADER_SPECIAL_SHIELDSPLOSION_DESCRIP: Consume all of your current <style=cIsHealing>Barrier (Minimum 10%)</style> to gain a burst of <style=cIsUtility>Movement Speed</style> and deal <style=cIsDamage>600-6000% damage</style> around you based on <style=cIsHealing>Barrier</style> consumed.
strings.ES_MERC_SPECIAL_SLASHPORT_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Slayer</style>. Target an enemy to <style=cIsUtility>expose, teleport to</style> and <style=cIsDamage>strike</style> them for <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style>, <style=cIsUtility>stunning</style> nearby enemies.
strings.ES_TOOLBOT_SECONDARY_NANOBOTS_DESCRIPTIO: Fire a <style=cIsUtility>beacon</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style> and inflicts <style=cArtifact>tracking</style> on impact.  After a delay, release <style=cIsDamage>nanobot swarms</style> for each nearby enemy that deal <style=cIsDamage>3x80% damage</style> and <style=cIsHealing>heal for 1.5% max hp each</style>.
strings.ES_TREEBOT_SPECIAL_ROOT_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Slow</style> yourself, but gain <style=cIsUtility>unyielding</style> for up to 8 seconds.  While active, deal <style=cIsDamage>250% damage</style> per second to nearby enemies, gaining <style=cIsHealing>barrier</style> per enemy hit and <style=cIsDamage>pulling them towards you</style>.
strings.ES_RAILGUNNER_PRIMARY_LANCEROUNDS_DESCRI: Fire heavy piercing rounds for <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>.  Half of <style=cIsUtility>bonus attack speed</style> is applied to <style=cIsDamage>damage</style> instead.
strings.ES_VOIDSURVIVOR_SPECIAL_INVERSION_DESCRI: Gain <style=cIsVoid>25% corruption</style>, consuming <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> to pull nearby enemies in for <style=cIsDamage>1000% damage</style>.
Crush <style=cIsVoid>25% corruption</style>, gaining <style=cIsHealing>25% health</style> and <style=cIsUtility>repelling</style> nearby enemies.
strings.ES_VOIDSURVIVOR_SPECIAL_INVERSION_KEYWOR: <style=cKeywordName>【Corruption Upgrade】</style><style=cSub>Transform to heal 25% health and repel enemies for no damage, losing 25% corruption.</style>
